messages.content:
Hello Mr. Arvind, 
Thanks a lot for reaching out. 
Also thanks for the amount of detail in your message. 

We are currently listing only Telangana. (2500+ verified listings).
We'll start other states soon. Especially Maharashtra. 
We'll keep you posted. 

With regards to your query on privacy of location - there will be multiple options - to post it publicly, to be visible only to our premium subscribers or to have it completely private (although this will reduce the visibility a lot).

More on this, we can discuss when we launch Maharashtra. 
Thank you.

*Subject: Inquiry about Selling Land on 1acre.in (Ganja Golai Plot, Latur)*

Dear 1acre.in Team,

I'm interested in selling a commercial plot of land in Latur and came across your platform while searching for options.

The plot is located in a prime commercial area at Ganj Golai, Latur. 

Here are some details:
â¢	Location: Prime commercial plot at Ganj Golai, Latur.
â¢	Price: â¹18,00,00,000
â¢	Size: 40 x 145 feet
â¢	Key Features:
o	Excellent connectivity near Ganj Golai Chowk.
o	Ideal for entrepreneurs, developers, and investors.
o	Strategic investment with promising returns.

1acre.in connects sellers with potential buyers and offers verification services to ensure a smooth transaction.

While I'm interested in your services, I'd appreciate it if you could elaborate on how you handle situations where a seller might prefer not to reveal the exact location initially on the platform.

Additionally, I'd love to know more about:
â¢	The process of selling land through your platform
